name: Zelda: Ocarina of Time 3D E3 Video
description: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time 3D brings a completely re-mastered version of this epic entry in the beloved The Legend of Zelda series to the Nintendo 3DS system. The game couples phenomenally enhanced graphics with stunning glasses-free 3D visuals to bring to life the daring adventures of its hero, Linkâ„¢, in the epic tale of the creation of Hyrule and the struggle for control of its all-powerful ancient relic.
